Articles.Content:
Basically, I\'m just curious to see what everyone\'s getting on their flights after having seen this...

That\'s right, it spells Billy-Bobdorf Kerman. What have you guys been seeing as your weirdest kerbal names?
name = Geofnard Kerman, taken from my persistence file cause well... He was on the flight where i discovered you can put boosters on the tops of boosters...

Jill kerman.

jeb+bill?

This crew is strange not for unusual names, but because their names were not unusual. I\'ve never had a crew with such normal names.

Luke was handpicked by Jeb, too, by the looks of it.
I\'ve seen a middle seated kerbal named scott, who was selected by Jeb.

I had an

Kerman once.
The archenemy of Munwig, Munbald, took a flight on one of my rockets.
Razor Kerman... got him like 5 times

This crew is strange not for unusual names, but because their names were not unusual. I\'ve never had a crew with such normal names.

Luke was handpicked by Jeb, too, by the looks of it.

That\'s what we Lukes are all about.

That\'s what we Lukes are all about.

ohh yeah! (ma names luke too ;P )

Billy-Bobfrey Kerman.

I made a thread about this a LONG time ago.

HERE

This crew is strange not for unusual names, but because their names were not unusual. I\'ve never had a crew with such normal names.

Luke was handpicked by Jeb, too, by the looks of it.

I hate to say it, but I\'m calling bull on that being a randomly generated set of names. You must\'ve SFS edited.

Firstly, the chance of getting all 3 of them together with regular names is astronomical, and...

Secondly, I doubt they have single syllables in the list consisting of 'Luke' and 'James' (both single syllable names, they\'d need to be put specifically into the list). 'Ad' and 'am' being separate syllables put together is plausible, but when combined with the first point...

Own up to your save file editing, man!
I got Scotty as the engineer, who didn\'t scream at all. Star Trek FTW!

I hate to say it, but I\'m calling bull on that being a randomly generated set of names. You must\'ve SFS edited.

Firstly, the chance of getting all 3 of them together with regular names is astronomical, and...

Secondly, I doubt they have single syllables in the list consisting of 'Luke' and 'James' (both single syllable names, they\'d need to be put specifically into the list). 'Ad' and 'am' being separate syllables put together is plausible, but when combined with the first point...

Own up to your save file editing, man!

There are crew members named Luke and James in the default crew list, but no Adam.

I\'ve had munley, sigrick, Donlong and Wehrnie.

What\'s with the strange names?
Now somebody try to get Munwig and Munbald on the same flight together, just through random generation.

I hate to say it, but I\'m calling bull on that being a randomly generated set of names.

I can attest here that drawing a crew with a James, Adam and Luke Kerman is perfectly possible, although needless to say, quite a rare thing.

Oh, and sorry but Razor Kerman isn\'t possible without manually editing names. I don\'t doubt you got him 5 times though, as they will respawn after they die, so it\'s quite likely you will see a previously assigned crewmember again eventually.

Cheers
Is Luigi a kerbal name? D:

Oh, and sorry but Razor Kerman isn\'t possible without manually editing names. I don\'t doubt you got him 5 times though, as they will respawn after they die, so it\'s quite likely you will see a previously assigned crewmember again eventually.

You can, if you restart the flight, I think.

OMG I corrected HarvesteR

I can attest here that drawing a crew with a James, Adam and Luke Kerman is perfectly possible, although needless to say, quite a rare thing.

Oh, and sorry but Razor Kerman isn\'t possible without manually editing names. I don\'t doubt you got him 5 times though, as they will respawn after they die, so it\'s quite likely you will see a previously assigned crewmember again eventually.

Cheers

Oh, wow. Sorry for the doubt then, Extemporary. That\'s was quite cool.
Danger Kerman.

Danger Kerman.

Got him on a Mun landing. It was obvious he was piloting. I think Jeb selected him personally for the mission.

Razor Kerman... got him like 5 times

Da Bad Dude! (And now, I\'ve confused the hell out of everyone who\'s A: younger than about 25, and/or B: has never been a pro wrestling fan.)
I got 'Kelvis' once - They say he used to be a singer or something...

I got 'Kelvis' once - They say he used to be a singer or something...

Just don\'t tell Nova.
